dict.acceptation: 在…的侧面；在…旁边；与…并排；

sent.orig: The ship berth alongside the quay or come alongside the quay.
Nevertheless it is nice to see camels here alongside the horses.
sent.trans: 然而，能够看到骑兵和马匹一起也是一件非常不错的事情。

sent.orig: Russian is still widely used alongside the national language, Uzbek.
sent.trans: 俄语仍然广泛地与官方语言乌兹别克语并用。

sent.orig: The captain ordered to lay the vessel alongside the wharf.
sent.trans: 船长下令将船横靠码头。

sent.orig: The freighter moored alongside the wharf.
